channel.title: Stop moving npc's
channel.description: Uhm, can someone tell me how to stop npc/shops from moving on 667/721 :P

item.title: Stop moving npc's
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

well im not to sure with 667 but it cant be 2 different from pi.

but in pi u go to data-cfg-spawn config and heres an example of my code. again im not sure if its really different but im trying to help so dont be mad if its 100% off. for me the 0 hilighted in green is the number that causes the npc to move. the higher the number the more it moves. so if its set to 0 it wont move at all, 1 moves 1 box around its spawn, if its set to 2 it moves 2 boxâ€™s around its spawn, etc. hope this helped and again sorry if it doesnt, it cant be much different

spawn = 733 3226 3399 0 3 3 20 20 Bartender Varrock

Read full topic
